trans-unit.source: Developing tools and using Derby with an IDE

seg-source.mrk: Developing tools and using Derby with an IDE

target.mrk: Developing tools and using Derby with an IDE

trans-unit.source: Applications such as database tools are designed to work with databases whose schemas and contents are unknown in advance. This section discusses a few topics useful for such applications.

seg-source.mrk: Applications such as database tools are designed to work with databases whose schemas and contents are unknown in advance.
This section discusses a few topics useful for such applications.

target.mrk: Applications such as database tools are designed to work with databases whose schemas and contents are unknown in advance.
This section discusses a few topics useful for such applications.
